languages.text: {n}Внутри царит полумрак, но вы замечаете в дальнем углу человека. В руках он отчаянно сжимает разряженное лазружье. При виде вас его глаза расширяются от осознания — и ужаса.{/n} "Н-не может быть... В-вольный Торговец!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Внутри царит полумрак, но вы замечаете в дальнем углу человека. В руках он отчаянно сжимает разряженный лазган. При виде вас его глаза расширяются от осознания — и ужаса.{/n} "Н-не может быть... В-вольный Торговец!"

languages.text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: {n}Внутри царит полумрак, но вы замечаете в дальнем углу человека. В руках он отчаянно сжимает разряженное лазружье. При виде вас его глаза расширяются от осознания — и ужаса.{/n} "Н-не может быть... В-вольный Торговец!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

{n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

{n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: {n}中は明かりがほとんど無いが、奥まった場所に一人の人物が立っていると分かる。声の主は手の中に発射後のラスガンを懸命に握っている。こちらを見てその正体に気づくと目を見開き、恐怖で慄く。{/n}「ま、まさか…自由開拓者だと！」
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}中は明かりがほとんど無いが、奥まった場所に一人の人物が立っていると分かる。声の主は手の中に発射後のラスガンを懸命に握っている。こちらを見てその正体に気づくと目を見開き、恐怖で慄く。{/n}「ま、まさか…自由開拓者だと！」

languages.text: {n}里面光线很暗，但你看到有个人站在远处的角落里，正拼命地握紧了一把已经耗光了电的激光枪。看到你之后，他瞪大了眼睛，满心恐惧。{/n}“不……不可能……是行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}里面光线很暗，但你看到有个人站在远处的角落里，正拼命地握紧了一把已经耗光了电的激光枪。看到你之后，他瞪大了眼睛，满心恐惧。{/n}“不……不可能……是行商浪人！”

languages.text: {n}Dentro apenas hay luz, pero distingues a alguien de pie en un rincón lejano. Sostiene desesperadamente un rifle láser sin munición. En cuanto te ve, sus ojos se abren de par en par en señal de reconocimiento... y de miedo.{/n} «N-no puede ser... ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dentro apenas hay luz, pero distingues a alguien de pie en un rincón lejano. Sostiene desesperadamente un rifle láser sin munición. En cuanto te ve, sus ojos se abren de par en par en señal de reconocimiento... y de miedo.{/n} «N-no puede ser... ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: {n}Der Raum dahinter ist nur schwach erleuchtet, aber du erkennst einen jungen Mann in der Ecke gegenüber. Er hält verzweifelt ein entladenes Lasergewehr in Händen. Als er dich sieht und erkennt, weiten sich seine Augen – auch vor Angst.{/n} "Das k-kann nicht sein ... {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Raum dahinter ist nur schwach erleuchtet, aber du erkennst einen jungen Mann in der Ecke gegenüber. Er hält verzweifelt ein entladenes Lasergewehr in Händen. Als er dich sieht und erkennt, weiten sich seine Augen – auch vor Angst.{/n} "Das k-kann nicht sein ... {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: {n}Malgré le faible éclairage, vous distinguez quelqu'un qui se tient dans le coin le plus éloigné, tenant désespérément un fusil laser déchargé dans ses mains. Lorsqu'il vous voit et vous reconnaît, ses yeux s'écarquillent de terreur.{/n} « C'est pas possible... {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré le faible éclairage, vous distinguez quelqu'un qui se tient dans le coin le plus éloigné, tenant désespérément un fusil laser déchargé dans ses mains. Lorsqu'il vous voit et vous reconnaît, ses yeux s'écarquillent de terreur.{/n} « C'est pas possible... {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: {n}İçerisi iyi aydınlatılmamış olsa da uzak köşede duran birini fark ediyorsun. Umutsuzca ellerindeki kullanım dışı kalmış silazerini kavrıyor. Seni gördüğünde korku dolu gözleri, kim olduğunu biliyormuşçasına kocaman oluyor.{/n} "O... Olamaz. Hür Tacir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Inside is poorly lit, but you spot a person standing in the far corner. He is desperately gripping a discharged lasgun in his hands. At the sight of you, his eyes widen in recognition — and fear.{/n} "It c-can't be... The Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İçerisi iyi aydınlatılmamış olsa da uzak köşede duran birini fark ediyorsun. Umutsuzca ellerindeki kullanım dışı kalmış lazer silahını kavrıyor. Seni gördüğünde korku dolu gözleri, kim olduğunu biliyormuşçasına kocaman oluyor.{/n} "O... Olamaz. Hür Tacir!"
